<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 0"
    pfs=""
>
[Polar Travel Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2426)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #189: Dreamers of the Nameless Spires](/Sources.aspx?ID=195) pg. 28</row>

**Price** 30 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A polar travel kit costs 30 gp and is 4 Bulk. Each kit includes a [bedroll](/Equipment.aspx?ID=7), a [climbing kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), a [compass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=16), a small knife, a [repair kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=43), a short shovel, a short saw for cutting ice, a set of skis and poles, a pair of snow goggles, a pair of snowshoes, a [spyglass](/Equipment.aspx?ID=54), twenty [tindertwigs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=138), and two sets of [winter clothing](/Equipment.aspx?ID=15).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Polar Travel Kit
